News

4 June 2024

Piloting the One Health Living Laboratory model in Uganda A workshop will be organized to refine the strategy for implementing the One Health Living Laboratory model in Uganda. See Workshop Info.

3 May 2024

One Health Prioritisation workshop in Kigali, Rwanda. The Digital One Health Lab, successfully organised a One Health prioritisation workshop, where it was agreed that DOH was one of the main areas for action and likely to be supported by The Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) in Rwanda.

13 March 2024

DOH lab members Monica Mbabazi, Vesa Qarkaxhija and Bryan Wee, are attending the Wellcome Genomes, Big Data and Emerging Technologies conference in Hinxton, UK.

29 February 2024

The DOH lab handing over Nanopore sequencing equipment to the Ugandan Ministry of Water & Environment, the Central Public Health Laboratories and the National Animal Disease and Diagnostic Epidemiology Centre. See more on Twitter.

26 February 2024

The DOH lab members Vesa Qarkaxhija, Bryan Wee, Adrian Muwonge and Frank Chilanga led a Nanopore bacterial whole genome sequencing workshop at the Central Pubic Health Labs in Uganda. See more here.

22 November 2023

Adrian and Kathrin, representing the Digital One Health laboratory (DOHL), at the World AMR Awareness Week in Glasgow (WAAW). See more here.

8 November 2023

Our lastest paper ‘A Digital One Health framework to integrate data for public health decision-making’ has been published Read it here

29 October 2023

DOH hosts Fleming Legacy Review and Digital One Health Workshop in Uganda to Strengthen AMR Collaboration In September 2023 the lab helped to organise an Alumni Legacy Review meeting and a Digital One Health workshop in Entebbe, Uganda. Read more here

14 Mar 2023

Secondment to Bodastage Solutions Ltd in Uganda DOHL Core Scientist, Bryan Wee, spent 2 weeks in Uganda for a placement with Bodastage Solutions Ltd.

28 Dec 2022

Launch of THEA-DCT mobile app The THEA-DCT (Tracking Haulage in East Africa - Digtal Contact Tracing) tool launch event was held in Kampala. Read the news article here

17 Nov 2022

Website live!! The new DOHL website is now live
